localize.title: Buzzing on Reddit
localize.description: See what's buzzing on Reddit in your native language

blogPost.excerpt: Brainie uses music patterns to help your brain be more focused or relaxed. Designed for deep work to achieve flow or for relaxing sessions when you need to recharge. You can switch to different music patterns with different tempos to fit your needs.
blogPost.body: Brainie uses music patterns to help your brain be more focused or relaxed. Designed for deep work to achieve flow or for relaxing sessions when you need to recharge. You can switch to different music patterns with different tempos to fit your needs.
blogPost.title: Brainie - Music patterns to improve deep work, relaxation, and sleep.
blogPost.author: Petr Selinger

localize.description: Brainie使用音乐模式来帮助你的大脑更专注或更放松。专为深度工作而设计，以达到流畅的效果，或在您需要充电时放松休息。您可以切换到不同的音乐模式和不同的节奏，以满足您的需要。
localize.tagline: 改善深度工作、放松和睡眠的音乐模式。

localize.description: Brainie使用音樂模式來幫助你的大腦更專注或更放鬆。專爲深度工作而設計，以達到流暢的效果，或在您需要充電時放鬆休息。您可以切換到不同的音樂模式和不同的節奏，以滿足您的需要。
localize.tagline: 改善深度工作、放鬆和睡眠的音樂模式。

previous.excerpt: Say hello to Paperform V3! We’ve just released a bunch of new features that make Paperform easier to use than ever before. Features include **Guided Mode**, Slash Commands, Background videos and more.
previous.title: Paperform V3 - The best form builder just got better.

localize.description: 跟Paperform V3打个招呼吧 我们刚刚发布了一系列新功能，使Paperform比以前更容易使用。功能包括**引导模式**、斜线命令、背景视频等。
localize.tagline: 最好的表格建立者只是变得更好。

localize.description: 跟Paperform V3打個招呼吧 我們剛剛發佈了一系列新功能，使Paperform比以前更容易使用。功能包括**引導模式**、斜線命令、背景視頻等。
localize.tagline: 最好的表格建立者只是變得更好。

next.excerpt: Learn vim without enduring boring text only tutorials. vim.so gets you the muscle repetition needed to master vim quickly using interactive exercises. Vim adds code editing super powers to your editor of choice. Learn vim fast today!
next.title: vim.so - Learn vim fast with interactive exercises in the browser

localize.description: vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。Vim 为您选择的编辑器增加了代码编辑的超级能力。今天就来快速学习vim吧！Vim.so让你通过互动练习快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重复练习。
localize.tagline: 通过浏览器中的互动练习快速学习vim。

localize.description: vim.so讓你通過互動練習快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重複練習。Vim 爲您選擇的編輯器增加了代碼編輯的超級能力。今天就來快速學習vim吧！Vim.so讓你通過互動練習快速掌握vim所需的肌肉重複練習。
localize.tagline: 通過瀏覽器中的互動練習快速學習vim。
